channel.title: aws on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in aws on Nathan R. Yergler

item.description: TIL that you need to grant permissions to more than just your elasticbeanstalk-<region>-<account> S3 bucket when deploying to Elastic Beanstalk; you also need permissions on elasticbeanstalk-*.

item.title: Using ECR images with Elastic Beanstalk and CodeBuild
item.description: As I mentioned previously, I’ve been using CodePipeline and CodeBuild for continuous integration and delivery on a new project.

item.title: Continuous Integration with CodeBuild and CodePipeline
item.description: Last week I started on a new project — venture, perhaps — which means I’m in the thick of figuring out all the things you take for granted when you join an established project.
